mdRecord.dcterms:title: Phlebotome
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson and Johnson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Multi-blade phlebotomy lancet, reproduction; accompanied by reproduction label: The Tools of Surgery, Reproduction of lancet used for bloodletting in the 18th-19th Century. This instrument, predominant in medical therapy, had multiple knives, of varied cutting depths, to control the quantity and rapidity of the withdrawal of blood; Johnson & Johnson, 1971.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
